steadystate.planar: ((- dk_lambda_x * tany * dx1 + dk_lambda_y * tanx * dy1)>0) * (- dk_lambda_x * tany * dx1 + dk_lambda_y * tanx * dy1)

transient.planar: ((- dk_lambda_x * tany * dx1 + dk_lambda_y * tanx * dy1)>0) * (- dk_lambda_x * tany * dx1 + dk_lambda_y * tanx * dy1)

steadystate.planar: ((- dk_lambda_x * tany * dx1 + dk_lambda_y * tanx * dy1)<0) * (- dk_lambda_x * tany * dx1 + dk_lambda_y * tanx * dy1)

transient.planar: ((- dk_lambda_x * tany * dx1 + dk_lambda_y * tanx * dy1)<0) * (- dk_lambda_x * tany * dx1 + dk_lambda_y * tanx * dy1)

steadystate.planar: (- dk_lambda_x * tany * dx1 + dk_lambda_y * tanx * dy1)

transient.planar: (- dk_lambda_x * tany * dx1 + dk_lambda_y * tanx * dy1)

dek_flux_zero.equation: f = - \lambda \frac{\partial T}{\partial n_0} = 0), - \frac{p_\mathrm{air} R T}{M \mu} \frac{\partial p}{\partial n_0} = -
dek_flux_zero.name: Zero heat and moisture fluxes

dek_heat_flux_misture_flux.equation: f = - \lambda \frac{\partial T}{\partial n_0} = f_0 + \alpha \left ( T_\mathrm{ext} - T \right), p = p_\mathrm{sat}(T_0) * \varphi_0
dek_heat_flux_misture_flux.name: Heat flux and moisture flux

dek_heat_flux_moisture.equation: f = - \lambda \frac{\partial T}{\partial n_0} = f_0 + \alpha \left ( T_\mathrm{ext} - T \right), p = p_\mathrm{sat}(T_0) * \varphi_0
dek_heat_flux_moisture.name: Heat flux and moisture

dek_heat_flux_thickness.equation: f = - \lambda \frac{\partial T}{\partial n_0} = f_0 + \alpha \left ( T_\mathrm{ext} - T \right), p = p_\mathrm{sat}(T_0) * \varphi_0
dek_heat_flux_thickness.name: Heat flux and equivalent thickness

dek_temperature_moisture.equation: T = T_0, - \frac{p_\mathrm{air} R T}{M \mu} \frac{\partial p}{\partial n_0} = -
dek_temperature_moisture.name: Temperature and moisture

dek_heat_flux.equation: f = - \lambda \frac{\partial T}{\partial n_0} = f_0 + \alpha \left ( T_\mathrm{ext} - T \right)
dek_heat_flux.name: Heat flux

equivalent_diffusion_length_vector.axi: r * dk_ltc / dk_sd * psat(dk_Te) * dk_phi / 100 * vval

laplace_heat.axi: dk_lambda_x * r * udr * vdr + dk_lambda_y * r * udz * vdz
laplace_heat.cart: dk_lambda_x * udx * vdx + dk_lambda_y * udy * vdy
laplace_heat.planar: dk_lambda_x * udx * vdx + dk_lambda_y * udy * vdy

laplace_moisture.axi: cpair*cR*cT/(cM * dk_mu_x) * r * udr * vdr + cpair*cR*cT/(cM * dk_mu_y) * r * udz * vdz
laplace_moisture.cart: cpair*cR*cT/(cM * dk_mu_x) * udx * vdx + cpair*cR*cT/(cM * dk_mu_y) * udy * vdy
laplace_moisture.planar: cpair*cR*cT/(cM * dk_mu_x) * udx * vdx + cpair*cR*cT/(cM * dk_mu_y) * udy * vdy
